lf
lf <- list(

    f1 = function(x)
    x,

    f2 = function(x)
    x,

#00000000000000000000000000000000000000000
#00000000000000000000000000000000000000000
#00000000000000000000000000000000000000000
#00000000000000000000000000000000000000000
#00000000000000000000000000000000000000000
#00000000000000000000000000000000000000000
#00000000000000000000000000000000000000000
#00000000000000000000000000000000000000000
#00000000000000000000000000000000000000000
#00000000000000000000000000000000000000000

#00000000000000000000000000000000000000000
#00000000000000000000000000000000000000000
#00000000000000000000000000000000000000000
#00000000000000000000000000000000000000000
#00000000000000000000000000000000000000000
#00000000000000000000000000000000000000000
#00000000000000000000000000000000000000000
#00000000000000000000000000000000000000000
#00000000000000000000000000000000000000000
#00000000000000000000000000000000000000000
    f3 = function(x)
    x
)

> lf$f3
Error in `Encoding<-`(`*tmp*`, value = enc) : 
  'value' must be of positive length

> lf$f3
function(x)
    x

source
srcref
NULL
lf2 <- list(
    f1 = function(x)
    x,
    f2 = function(x)
    x,
    f3 = function(x)
    x
)

lf3 <- lapply(lf, function(x) { attr(x, "srcref") <- NULL; x })


> lf2$f3
function(x)
    x

> lf3$f3
function (x) 
x
